name: NFDI4Health_LM_Metadataschema_NE_V3_3
title: NFDI4Health LM Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema (UC 5.1) V3.3
description: NFDI4Health LogicalModel Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema (Use Case 5.1) V3.3

mapping.name: NFDI4Health Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema Version 3.3 Mapping to internal numbering of Metadataschema Version 3.3

element.short: NFDI4Health LM Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema (UC 5.1) V3.3
element.definition: NFDI4Health LogicalModel Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema (Use Case 5.1) V3.3

element.short: Diet assessment information collected in the [RESOURCE]
element.definition: Group of items providing information on diet assessment.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..*, if Resource.nutritionalData == 'Yes'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Specification of the dietary assessment instrument used in the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select one value from the list. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: The number of items inquired by the food frequency questionnaire (FFQ).
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if DietAssessment.instrument == 'Food frequency questionnaire (FFQ)'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.short: Mode(s) used to apply the dietary assessment instrument
element.definition: Specification of how the dietary assessment instrument was applied to participants of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select all that apply. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.short: Device(s) used to apply the dietary assessment instrument
element.definition: Specification of device(s) used to apply the dietary assessment instrument to participants of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select all that apply. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Specification of how the portion size is inquired in the dietary assessment instrument.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select all that apply. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication of the reference period the dietary assessment instrument refers to (e.g. 24-h recall refers to the previous day).
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select all that apply. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.short: Numerical value of reference period units
element.definition: Numerical value of reference period units
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication whether the same instrument was applied repeatedly.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication of how often the dietary assessment instrument was repeatedly applied.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if DietAssessment.repeat == 'Yes'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication whether the dietary assessment instrument was validated.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication of the reference describing the validation.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if DietAssessment.validity == 'Yes'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication whether the dietary assessment instrument was described according to its reliability.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication of the reference describing the reliability measures.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if DietAssessment.reliability == 'Yes'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication whether the dietary assessment instrument inquires information about dietary supplements.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements
